title: The Equations of Motion
text: Use the equation: $$v=u+a t$$, where v is the final velocity (0 $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in this case), u is the initial velocity, a is the deceleration, and $$t$$ is the time.

title: Initial Velocity Calculation
text: Rearrange the equation $$v=u+a t$$ to solve for u. Substitute the given values for v, a, and $$t$$, and solve for u.
